title: He adulterates, she adulterates (1963) Colorized Italian Movie | Subtitled

sources.title: He adulterates, she adulterates (1963) Colorized Italian Movie | Subtitled
sources.description:
Lina, a young woman now tired of the constant betrayals from her husband, decides to cheat on him with a mutual friend, Piero.

B&W version https://youtu.be/0UWsXDBr1fg
Original title: Adultero lui, adultera lei (1963) AKA: He adulterates, she adulterates

Genre: Italian cinema, Comedy
Director: Raffaello Matarazzo
Writer: Raffaello Matarazzo
Stars: MarilÃ¹ Tolo, Luigi Giuliani, Umberto D'Orsi
